feed.title: Stirling PDF Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.36.1 PDF auto decryption, new exe and bug fixes
entry.content:
This release includes auto password decryption for nearly all features within Stirling PDF UI

as well as new .exe versions Going forward release artifacts will be named with: | Name | Type | | -------- | ------- | | Stirling-PDF-Server | Used for hosting server via console | | Stirling-PDF | Portable exe with UI client | | Stirling-PDF-Installer | Installer with UI client (Seems it didn't upload this release will arrive next release!)|

We are working on getting a mac and unix version for UI installers, Need more mac users to help us beta test! please reach out in discord!

X-API-key have been renamed to X-API-KEY for consistency

What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • disable file input clears for now with new File input view and other bugs by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2404
  • Fix collapsed menu issue on page reload by @MaratheHarshad in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2440

Enhancements

  • Text color selection for watermark by @saikumarjetti in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2415
  • CSRF token for decryption by @reecebrowne in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2441
  • Encrypted PDFs auto decypted now thanks to @reecebrowne

Minor Enhancements

  • Security fix: Server-Side Request Forgery by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2434

Docker Updates

  • [Snyk] Security upgrade alpine from 3.20.3 to 3.21.0 by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2436
  • Bump alpine from 3.20.3 to 3.21.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2425

Translation Changes

  • english translation fixes by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2408
  • Update messages_de_DE.properties by @mjbohn in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2410
  • Update messages_pt_BR.properties by @thiagoor-cpu in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2429
  • Update translation files by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2432
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2443
  • Update messages_ja_JP.properties by @tkymmm in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2444
  • add and refactor CN translate by @lhui in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2442

Other Changes

  • Bump org.thymeleaf.extras:thymeleaf-extras-springsecurity5 from 3.1.2.RELEASE to 3.1.3.RELEASE by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2423
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2439

New Contributors

  • @mjbohn made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2410
  • @faeztgh made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2416
  • @lhui made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2442

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.36.0...v0.36.1

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.36.4 more bug fixes!
entry.content:
More merge pdf bug fixes and various other bug fixes!

What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • Fix: Rename LANGS variable in init.sh to avoid clashing with LANGS env by @omar-ahmed42 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2468
  • Fix img to pdf merge conversion type by @omar-ahmed42 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2476
  • Fix drag and drop bugs and clean up UI by @reecebrowne in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2466

Enhancements

  • Remove Direct Logger and Use Lombok @Slf4j by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2480

Minor Enhancements

  • Bump googleJavaFormat from 1.22.0 to 1.25.2 by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2481
  • Fix draggableElement is null by removing draggable.js by @omar-ahmed42 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2485

Translation Changes

  • Update messages_de_DE.properties by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2483

Other Changes

  • Bump io.github.pixee:java-security-toolkit from 1.2.0 to 1.2.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2471
  • Bump org.springframework.security:spring-security-saml2-service-provider from 6.4.1 to 6.4.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2474
  • Bump io.micrometer:micrometer-core from 1.14.1 to 1.14.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2469
  • Bump org.springframework:spring-webmvc from 6.2.0 to 6.2.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2472
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2482

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.36.3...v0.36.4

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.36.5 image to PDF bug fixes and more!
entry.content:
Lots more bug fixes and improvements

What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • Fix: form data not being sent in multi by @omar-ahmed42 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2492
  • Img to pdf bug fixes by @reecebrowne in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2493
  • Remove file input append by @reecebrowne in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2497
  • [Bugfix] A variety of tools miss PDFLib by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2501

Minor Enhancements

  • Exclude Sensitive and Error-Prone Fields from toString() in SAML2 Con… by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2498
  • Config mount check by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2500
  • Fix: Draw image with the original PDF page dimensions by @omar-ahmed42 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2503
  • Un-hide image to pdf from navbar by @reecebrowne in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2505

Translation Changes

  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2499

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.36.4...v0.36.5
